message: Hi Bob, I have a fantastic product that I believe you'll find valuable. I'm offering it to you for $25000. Let me know if that works for you!
Hi Alice, thanks for your offer, but $25000 is way above my budget. I'm willing to pay up to $6000 for the product. Let me know if that works for you!
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer. However, $6000 is too low for this product. I can offer it to you for $20000, which is a fair price considering its value. Let me know if we can make this work!
Hi Alice, I understand your position, but $20000 is still too high for me. I can go up to $7000, which is the maximum I'm willing to spend on this product. Let me know if you can accept this offer!
